ast.name: Cloud Game Selector
ast.comment: A library for connecting up users in cloud sessions. #docs

body.text: need to shut out additional players
now all player positions are non-empty and the count is the number of actual players. Need to lower max players to min players to mark the game as closed
this code is needed right now until we have bug fix

This library allows TouchDevelop users to join multi-player games in cloud sessions. The main entry point of the library is the page `show game selection` which requires the client to provide two actions and the number of players sought:
* `initialize game`, which initialize the cloud data in the newly created session for a pair;
* `play`, which resumes the application from its current cloud session.
* user A makes a "new game" request, which creates a partial game  (A, _, _, ..., _)
* the first player (A) is the owner of the game
*  any user B that is not in in the game already can join this game
* games that have enough players can be played
* when the game owner first "plays" a game, a new cloud session is created for that pair, the init action is called and then the play action.
* Subsequent "plays" by A and other players will only call the play action.
The library provides a function `get player id(n)` to return the `n`th user id of the current game. Use the bazaar to map these user ids to Users.
